High Priest Orven:
Wonderful! I can perform a ceremony of purification in order to put our heroes' souls back to rest. I'll need you to bring me Aden Residents Remains from the undead around Devastated Castle. Our dead brothers came back from death in the form of doom archers, doom guards and doom servants. Given the power i can concentrate in a single ceremony you should take exactly 60 corpses before you come back. Now please hurry, our brave soldiers deserve a proper rest!
